name: Heavy Cargo Delivery Trailer
description:
So if you want to travel the dangerous roads of big city and uphills you wanna have a career as a trucking driver, then the best way to practice your truck driving skills is to play this Cargo Trailer Transport Truck game. Choose your vehicles that you that you want to drive, load cargo on trailer and drive trailer to destination.

Heavy Cargo Delivery Trailer gives an addictive game play experience and realistic city and also hill environment to drive the heavy truck and improve your truck driving skills. It gives you smooth driving and handling controls which will make you play this game for hours. Be on time to satisfy your clients because being late will result in the failure of your consignment. Transport the cargo goods and then park the Heavy trailer to complete your Mission.


Heavy Cargo Delivery Trailer: Features:

Smooth and Easy driving Controls
Realistic City Environment
Trailer and Truck parking
